FuncDef: This command defines the test ID to be assigned to the Tx and Rx counter-based loss test and creates the individual test. LMM does not carry this test-id in the PDU; the value is of local significance.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the value to be placed in the 4-byte test ID field of an ETH-DMM PDU. Values-0 to 2147483647.
